trans-unit.source: Update your Azure RemoteApp collection
trans-unit.target: Update your Azure RemoteApp collection

trans-unit.source: Learn how to update your Azure RemoteApp collection
trans-unit.target: Learn how to update your Azure RemoteApp collection

trans-unit.source: Update a collection in Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Update a collection in Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: There will come a time, inevitably, when you need to update the apps or image in your Azure RemoteApp collection.
trans-unit.target: There will come a time, inevitably, when you need to update the apps or image in your Azure RemoteApp collection.

trans-unit.source: If you are using one of the images included with your Azure RemoteApp subscription, in either a cloud or hybrid collection, any and all updates are handled by Azure RemoteApp itself, so you can rest easy.
trans-unit.target: If you are using one of the images included with your Azure RemoteApp subscription, in either a cloud or hybrid collection, any and all updates are handled by Azure RemoteApp itself, so you can rest easy.

trans-unit.source: However, if you are using a custom image (either that you built from scratch or that you created by modifying one of our images), you are in charge of maintaining the image and apps.
trans-unit.target: However, if you are using a custom image (either that you built from scratch or that you created by modifying one of our images), you are in charge of maintaining the image and apps.

trans-unit.source: So, how do you go about updating your collection?
trans-unit.target: So, how do you go about updating your collection?

trans-unit.source: It's fairly straightforward:
trans-unit.target: It's fairly straightforward:

trans-unit.source: Update the image that you used in your collection.
trans-unit.target: Update the image that you used in your collection.

trans-unit.source: Apply any patches or updates needed, and then save it with a new name.
trans-unit.target: Apply any patches or updates needed, and then save it with a new name.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Upload</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>import</linkText><title></title></link> that image to RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Upload</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>import</linkText><title></title></link> that image to RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Now, on the collection page, click Update.
trans-unit.target: Now, on the collection page, click Update.

trans-unit.source: Choose the new image from the Template Image list.
trans-unit.target: Choose the new image from the Template Image list.

trans-unit.source: Here's the tricky part - you need to decide how to deal with any users that are currently using an app in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Here's the tricky part - you need to decide how to deal with any users that are currently using an app in the collection.

trans-unit.source: You have the following choices:
trans-unit.target: You have the following choices:

trans-unit.source: Give users 60 minutes after the update.
trans-unit.target: Give users 60 minutes after the update.

trans-unit.source: As soon as the update is finished, Azure RemoteApp will display a message to any active users telling them to save their work and log off and log back in.
trans-unit.target: As soon as the update is finished, Azure RemoteApp will display a message to any active users telling them to save their work and log off and log back in.

trans-unit.source: After 60 minutes, any active users who have not logged off will be automatically logged off.
trans-unit.target: After 60 minutes, any active users who have not logged off will be automatically logged off.

trans-unit.source: Users can immediately log back on.
trans-unit.target: Users can immediately log back on.

trans-unit.source: Sign users out immediately.
trans-unit.target: Sign users out immediately.

trans-unit.source: As soon as the update is finished, log off all users automatically without any warning.
trans-unit.target: As soon as the update is finished, log off all users automatically without any warning.

trans-unit.source: If you choose this option, users might lose data.
trans-unit.target: If you choose this option, users might lose data.

trans-unit.source: However, they can reconnect to the app immediately.
trans-unit.target: However, they can reconnect to the app immediately.

trans-unit.source: Click the check mark to start the update.
trans-unit.target: Click the check mark to start the update.
